name: Meowentine Vengeance
description:
Cupid has been unkind to you on this Meowentine's Day. He broke up your relationship with your girlfriend and made her fall for someone else! Make things right by undoing the mess he created with your own bow and arrow! Climb the treetops to the skies and break as many hearts as possible in Meowentine Vengeance!

Use the arrow or WAD keys to move and jump, aim with your mouse, and click to draw your bow. Don't hold it down for too long, though!
